Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: LoggingConfiguration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.
Arn.markdownDescription:
LoggingConfiguration ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivschat:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:logging-configuration/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Id.description: The system-generated ID of the logging configuration.
Id.markdownDescription:
The system-generated ID of the logging configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Name.description: The name of the logging configuration. The value does not need to be unique.
Name.markdownDescription:
The name of the logging configuration. The value does not need to be unique.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

State.description: The state of the logging configuration. When the state is ACTIVE, the configuration is ready to log chat content.
State.markdownDescription:
The state of the logging configuration. When the state is ACTIVE, the configuration is ready to log chat content.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATING | CREATE_FAILED | DELETING | DELETE_FAILED | UPDATING | UPDATING_FAILED | ACTIVE  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
